title: Luxury 4 Bedroom 3 Bath townhome with ALL THE AMENITIES
description: Luxury living in Society Hill community awaits in this 4 Bedroom, 2 ½ bath townhome with ALL THE AMENITIES. All the many charms of Queen Village & Society Hill and just steps from the newly improved HEADHOUSE PLAZA. Meet grandeur from the moment you walk through the door, with 18 FT CEILINGS in your formal dining room and elegant HARDWOOD FLOORS THROUGHOUT. The “Chef’s Kitchen” with QUARTZ COUNTERTOPS, SHAKER CABINETS and top-of-the-line Viking,Subzero STAINLESS APPLIANCES, also has a pass through window/ kitchen bar for open sightlines and easy entertaining. Move into a spectacular living room featuring a wood-burning fireplace that opens to a large private rear patio that exits to your SECURED/GATED PARKING. The sizeable master suite offers generous custom California walk in closet and a chicly remodeled EN-SUITE BATH with QUARTZ-TOPPED DOUBLE VANITY and large double walk-in shower. A 3rd floor terrace with garden views lays just beyond the laundry closet and 2 more well-sized bedrooms with ample closet space and share the 2nd full newly remodeled bath with tub/shower combo & quartz topped vanity. Possibilities abound on the lower level starting with a full-service wet bar, a styled up powder room and plentiful storage. Whether your preference is a media/ billiard room, office, 4th bedroom or a gym, there is definitely bonus space to work with! Aside from superior proximity to restaurants, shops, errands and parks, I-95 is just 2 minutes away for easier commutes. National Tenant Network application required for all potential tenants. Home also uses Meredith schools. Pets allowed on a case-by case basis and will include an additional deposit. Owner is a licensed PA salesperson.

title: House: Near "Linden Elementary" 480 Linden Ave* 3/2*
description:
Feels secluded and rural but very close to city amenities! This cottage is beautifully appointed and move-in ready! Fresh paint and laminate flooring in 2022. Built in 2009 but only been lived in from 2019 to today. Sitting pretty on a 1 acre wooded lot (just outside the city limits) that has a huge concrete pad with a portable storage building. 1/4 of the property is privacy fenced. Inside this well-built home you'll be delighted with 9' ceilings capped with crown molding. Boasting a great room style floor plan this home is a delight for entertaining. As comfortable as it is spacious and airy. The split bedrooms maximize privacy and the two front bedrooms share a hall bathroom. Since the walls were built with 2" x 6" studs these efficient double pane windows have lovely deep casings and each window has wide slat blinds. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Master bath features include a separate walk-in shower, double vanity, deep soaking garden tub and loads of natural light. Come sit at the breakfast bar and marvel at all the cabinets and shiny appliances. Loads of counter space and storage make this a chef's dream.
More information at-  KatherineNelson450gmail com

title: % Schedule your tour and submit your application today %
description:
The Belgrade
Welcome to The Belgrade, located in the red hot Fishtown neighborhood of Philadelphia!
With amazing modern finishes and spectacular amenities, including a huge furnished roof deck with complimentary WIFI and breathtaking city views, parking garage, secure package/mailroom, smart access to the building/mailroom with your smartphone or code, common green space, and an elevator for your convenience. Schedule your showing of this beautiful building today!
The Belgrade is conveniently Located just minutes from I-95, 676, across the street from Aramingo
Square/Cione Playground and easily accessible via public transportation. A trolley light rail station and a bus stop are less than a block away on Huntington St. and Aramingo Ave. WSFS Bank, several Bank ATMs, and Rite Aid are within a few block radius. The building is walkable to many nearby spots like Green Egg Cafe, Stocks Bakery, Memphis Taproom, Tacconelli's Pizza, Wawa, Planet Fitness , Cook and Shaker, Philadelphia Brewing, Pizza Brain.
The Belgrade features one, two and three-bedroom residences with multiple layouts all designed with style & comfort in mind. Units feature open kitchens with islands and spacious living rooms and functional bedrooms with great light and ample closet space. Each unit is beautifully designed utilizing the latest trends combined with traditional details. The spacious bedrooms can also be used as home offices for a work-from-home lifestyle. Our residences also boast the following incredible features:
Massive windows to allow for natural light
Cook's kitchens with stone countertops, stainless steel appliances (including gas ranges) and garbage disposals. Also, contemporary faucets and kitchen hardware in the latest finishes from dark bronze or brass to matte black, unique to each unit type.
Meticulously designed bathrooms with spacious wood vanities, ample storage, faucets/hardware in the latest finishes unique to each unit type and distinctive subway tiles

title: House for Rent
description: This is a Three-story, 3 bedroom, two-and-a-half-bathroom townhome located in Philly’s Port Richmond neighborhood. The main level boasts a spacious family room featuring hardwood floors, crown molding, and chair railing. The spacious kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, subway tile backsplash, ample cabinetry, double door reach-in pantry, powder room, and sliding glass door with access to a private patio, suited perfect for grilling & entertaining.  Up the wood stairs with wrought iron railing, the 2nd floor level provides 2 spacious bedrooms with ceiling fans, bright windows, and each with its own walk-in closet. Laundry room with smart LG washer & dryer, plus a handsomely tiled modern full bathroom is also on the 2nd floor for your convenience. 3rd level features the spacious owner's suite. The bedroom features a tray ceiling, recessed lighting and ceiling fan. The bathroom is swank with a fully tiled glass enclosed shower with linear drain, ample sized double-door linen closet, soaking tub, and modern floating double vanity. Also connected to the owner’s retreat is a separate cozy space that can used as a sitting area, nursery, or office. Continue up the stairs to the rooftop deck with unobstructed city views. The lower finished basement level offers ample storage in the separate utility room, AND a very expansive space for storage, recreation, or whatever fits your lifestyle. There is a single car detached garage which boasts built-in shelving and ceiling mounted metal wire shelving for even more added storage. Home is equiped with Dual Zone central heating & cooling for your added comfort and a natural gas Weber grill is available for use in the private patio. REQUIRES: First, Last, & Security, Must pass credit check & employment verification!

title: Quiet Living 12 minutes from the center of Newark New Jersey
description:
Beautiful one bedroom with vaulted ceilings and tile floors throughout. Located on the north end of Newark, just 8 tenths of a mile up Patrick Creek Road. 640 square feet with a pull down stair to a large storage room. Living, dining and kitchen have a vaulted ceiling. Bedroom has a door to the rear porch. Oak cabinets, tile counter tops, ceiling fans and nice lighting. Covered porches front and back. Washer and dryer hookup and water softener. This apartment is attached to a three bedroom home, but has excellent sound barrier between them. The common wall between the two units is two 2x4 walls with 6 layers of drywall. The living areas are on opposite sides of the house. House is 8 years old and in clean condition.
We do not take cats, dogs or any other pets. Please don't call if you have a pet.
House sits on 2 treed acres next to Patrick Creek flowing year round. Twelve minutes from the center of town. I would encourage renters with all wheel or four wheel drive vehicles as the road can be snowy or a bit icy in the winter.
Rent is $830.00 and includes utilities- water, sewer, electric, heat, soft water and plowing (for heavier snows).

title: Pet friendly renovated townhome with new kitchen and yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Not showing till after July 15
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Huge mother-in-law suite with NEW kitchen and balcony
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm.  show contact info

Hey everyone!!
Looking for renters for August 1st (2022) for our gorgeous spacious home in Norris Square right next to Fishtown/Northern Liberties!! We have 3 bedrooms available NOW.

Located in Norris Square just 5 minutes away from Fishtown. Close to lots of restaurants, bars, and coffee shops to explore around!
4 blocks away (5 minutes walk) from the train (York-Daulphin station for the Market Frankford line)
15 minute train ride to Center City Philadelphia!
Plenty of free street parking
- 4 bedroom 4 bathroom house; each bedroom has its own individual full bathroom!
-2 bedrooms are located on the second floor and 1 in the basement
-Each room is spacious (2,900 sq ft)

- Access to rooftop deck w/ amazing views

We have a collie/german shepherd mix named Tibby, he is an old soul, who just loves to take naps and chill. My boyfriend and I are friendly people who love to host board game nights & dinner parties once in a while (which you’re always welcome to join). We are looking for clean, nice, & respectful people.

Looking for lease length at minimum a year. Credit check & background check will be required with an application, so serious inquiries ONLY. Please feel free to message me if you're interested or have any questions! We can schedule a day for you to come check out the place and meet us!
